miniapp.name: Liminal
miniapp.subtitle: A fast-paced arcade game of reflexes.
miniapp.description: Test your reflexes in an atmospheric, ever-changing world. Swipe in the correct direction before time runs out, climb the on-chain leaderboard, and see how long you can survive. Features dynamic difficulty, joker cards, multiplier system, and an evolving audio-visual experience that intensifies as you progress deeper into the game.
miniapp.tagline: The deeper you go, the more it changes.
miniapp.ogTitle: Liminal - A Fast-Paced Arcade Game of Reflexes
miniapp.ogDescription: Test your reflexes in an atmospheric, ever-changing world. The deeper you go, the more it changes. Compete on the on-chain leaderboard!
